name: Conversation Status Tracking
description: Add status column to conversations table (Draft | With Research) with auto-update when research runs are created, and Edit buttons in IdeationQueueCard and InlineIdeaView to navigate to /conversation/[id] page

reasoning.type: User story describes both backend (status column + database migration + auto-update) and frontend (UI updates to 2 components)
reasoning.scope: Changes limited to conversation feature - backend schema, service updates, API changes, and 2 frontend components
reasoning.complexity: Moderate - requires database migration, backend status update logic, API changes, and coordinated frontend updates
reasoning.requiresUserStories: False - file-driven approach is sufficient. While fullstack and user-facing, the scope is contained to a single feature with clear technical requirements (status enum + edit buttons).
reasoning.workflow: Full workflow needed due to fullstack nature: database schema changes (migration), backend API updates (FastAPI), frontend component modifications (Next.js), and documentation

reuse.reason: Existing card component - needs Edit button added
Existing inline view - needs Edit button added
shadcn Button component for Edit button
Pattern for adding column and refreshing dashboard view

phases.notes: REVISED: Changed from computed status to stored ENUM column per user request

phases.description: Analyze existing conversation schema, API patterns, and component structure
Design status enum, migration strategy, API changes, and UI patterns

subtasks.description: Guide database migration and API endpoint updates
Guide component modifications and routing patterns

phases.description: Execute database migration, backend changes, and frontend updates
Update architecture docs with new status field pattern

decisions.reason: Requires database migration, backend API changes, and frontend component updates. Full coordination needed across tech stack.

Despite being fullstack and user-facing, the scope is well-defined with 3 clear acceptance criteria that map directly to technical tasks. No user journey decomposition needed - file-driven approach is more efficient.
Edit button is a simple standard UI pattern (button with text). No visual design or animation complexity.
Database schema changes and migration patterns require FastAPI expertise
Component modifications and routing to /conversation/[id] require Next.js expertise
REVISED per user request. User wants a dedicated status column for better status handling. Enables direct queries, explicit state management, and flexibility for future status values.

alternatives.name: computed-status-pattern
alternatives.rejectedWhy: User explicitly requested stored column for better status control

decisions.reason: Two-state ENUM matching user story. 'draft' = initial state, 'with_research' = has launched research
PostgreSQL TEXT with CHECK constraint is more flexible than ENUM type for future additions. Pattern consistent with existing status columns (e.g., research_pipeline_runs.status)
All new conversations start as 'draft'. Existing conversations without status should default to 'draft' during migration.
Update status to 'with_research' in create_research_pipeline_run() method. Application-level logic is easier to maintain than database triggers and matches existing patterns.
Place Edit button in footer area next to existing expand/collapse toggle for consistency. Use stopPropagation to prevent card click.
Lucide Pencil icon is standard for edit actions, already imported in codebase

acceptanceCriteria.description: Create a status column for conversations: Draft | With Research (when we have launched research)
technicalRequirements: Add 'status' TEXT column to conversations table with CHECK constraint
Default value: 'draft'
Allowed values: 'draft', 'with_research'
Migration backfills existing conversations: set to 'with_research' if has research runs, else 'draft'
Update conversation_dashboard_view to include status column
Add status field to ConversationResponse model
Add status field to FullConversation and DashboardConversation NamedTuples

acceptanceCriteria.description: Auto-update status when research run is created
technicalRequirements: In create_research_pipeline_run(), update parent conversation status to 'with_research'
Add update_conversation_status() method to ConversationsMixin
Lookup conversation_id via idea_id when creating run
Transaction safety: status update should be in same transaction as run creation
